title: Your weather update for Tuesday (22)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Meteorology announced that showers or thundershowers will occur at a few places in Central, Uva, and Eastern provinces after 2.00 p.m.
Several spells of light showers will occur in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and Galle and, Matara districts in the morning.
Autism-affected girl swims from Sri Lanka to Dhanushkodi in 13 hours
